transition_duration.css_code: .square {  width: 100px;  height: 100px;  border-radius: 8px;  background-color: springgreen;  transition-property: transform;  transition-timing-function: ease;  padding: 8px;}.square.td-instant {  transition-duration: 0s;}.square.td-speedy {  transition-duration: 200ms;}.square.td-middling {  transition-duration: 800ms;}.square.td-glacial {  transition-duration: 5s;}.square:is(:hover, :focus) {  transform: scale(0.8);}.wrapper {  display: grid;  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;  grid-gap: 32px;}.wrapper .square:nth-child(odd) {  justify-self: end;}.wrapper .square:nth-child(even) {  justify-self: start;}
